interface.name: seL4_IRQControl
interface.cap_description: An IRQControl capability. This gives you the authority to make this call.

method.name: GetIOAPIC
method.brief: Create an IRQ handler capability for an interrupt from an IOAPIC.

param.name: root
param.description: CPTR to the CNode that forms the root of the destination CSpace. Must be at a depth of 32.

param.name: index
param.description: CPTR to the destination slot. Resolved from the root of the destination CSpace.

param.name: depth
param.description: Number of bits of index to resolve to find the destination slot.

param.name: ioapic
param.description: Zero based index of IOAPIC to get interrupt from, ordered the same as in ACPI tables

param.name: pin
param.description: IOAPIC pin that generates the interrupt.

param.name: level
param.description: Indicates whether the IOAPIC should be programmed to treat this interrupt as level triggered.

param.name: polarity
param.description: Indicates whether the IOAPIC should be programmed to treat this interrupt as high or low triggered

param.name: vector
param.description: CPU vector to deliver the interrupt to.

method.name: GetMSI
method.brief: Create an IRQ handler capability for an interrupt from an MSI.

param.name: root
param.description: CPTR to the CNode that forms the root of the destination CSpace. Must be at a depth of 32.

param.name: index
param.description: CPTR to the destination slot. Resolved from the root of the destination CSpace.

param.name: depth
param.description: Number of bits of index to resolve to find the destination slot.

param.name: pci_bus
param.description: PCI bus ID of the device that will generate the interrupt.

param.name: pci_dev
param.description: PCI device ID of the device that will generate the interrupt.

param.name: pci_func
param.description: PCI function ID of the device that will generate the interrupt.

param.name: handle
param.description: Value of the handle programmed into the data portion of the MSI.

param.name: vector
param.description: CPU vector to deliver the interrupt to.
